metadata.label: Physical description
metadata.value: Machine readable catalogue compatible with IIIF 2.0 Presentation API

metadata.label: Notes
metadata.value: All items have coresponding IIIF 3.0 manifests with internal references to more details. The field seeAlso should be parsed carefully.

metadata.label: Subjects
metadata.value: Travel, Life Styles, Politic, Culture, Art, Architecture, History, Geography, Archeology.

metadata.label: GLAM
metadata.value: Internet Archive, Gallica, QDL, Berlin, David Rumsey Collection, NLI, BULAC, INHA

en: An experimental catalogue for digital resources in various GLAMs related to the voyages and sometimes historical events about the Persia(IRAN).
This catalogue is fully machine readable/consumable and intended to adhere IIIF 2.0 Presentation.
Accessing the full data required to multiple Request. The full data access model will be publishe soon.
Use it with care, The information in this list is changing almost daily and may be subject to significant changes.

en: Exotic political-physical-medical attractions, 5 volumes, containing various reports, observations and descriptions of things in Persia and further Asia, with much attention to detail.
fa: جاذبه های عجیب و غریب سیاسی-فیزیکی-پزشکی، 5 جلدی، حاوی گزارش های مختلف، مشاهدات و توصیفات موجود در ایران و آسیای بیشتر، با توجه به جزئیات.
